name: Tom P. Patnaik
summary: Senior business development manager with 20+ years of experience in sales management, marketing and applications engineering of filtration and drying systems for bio-pharmaceuticals, fine chemicals, agro-chemicals and other industries. Demonstrated ability to drive high-value revenue growth, develop strategic roadmaps, lead cross-functional teams, and expand sales channels through consultative selling and solution-focused approaches.

experience.title: Senior Business Development Manager
experience.description: Growing engineering services to major Food & Beverage and Chemical clients through strategic alliances, creating new service solutions such as product lifecycle management, asset management, enterprise mobility and Internet of Things; familiar with onsite-offshore engagement models. Actively scoped and proposed near-shore engineering center; worked with Coca Cola, DuPont, BASF among others.

experience.title: Director, Sales & Marketing
experience.description: Turned around the sales and profitability of a European manufacturer of centrifuges, filters, dryers and ball valves for bio-pharmaceuticals, specialty chemicals, agro-chemicals and other industries through strategic direction and direct selling/rep channels; more than doubled sales in 2 years and built a robust sales funnel.

experience.title: Sales/Application Engineer
experience.description: Provided direct sales and application engineering expertise to users of size-reduction, classifying, mixing and drying equipment as well as down-flow/laminar flow booths and active/passive isolation systems to the specialty chemicals, minerals and other industries; leveraged consultative sales to generate annual bookings.

experience.title: Consultant
experience.description: Provided sales, marketing, process and application engineering expertise to users of process equipment in life-science, chemical, mining and other industries for a specialized centrifuge consulting firm.

experience.title: Manager, Sales and Marketing
experience.description: Led sales and marketing management to launch several filtering centrifuge products to pharmaceutical, fine chemical, biotech customers worldwide through strategic planning, sales channel setup, marketing communications planning and event management; established design office and overseas manufacturing partner.

experience.title: Product Manager
experience.description: Responsible for filtration equipment sales/marketing to bio-pharmaceuticals, chemicals, and other customers; liaised with Swiss partner to launch high-dollar filter in the US for chromatography resin filtration; frontline sales/training, marketing collateral, pricing strategy, product positioning, trade-show participation.
